title: Did former CEO Wells Fargo say: " Some may even die '?
subtitle: Richard Kovakevich did not deny that he said this about staff returning to work in the midst of the Corona virus epidemic; however, he noted that some contexts had been removed.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: With regard to the reopening of the economy during the COVID-19 epidemic, the former Executive Director of the state of Wales Fargo said, "We will gradually bring these people back and see what happens. Some of them will get sick, some of them may die, and I don't know."
